channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10963] Hive throws NPE rather than meaningful error message when window is missing
item.description:
select sum(salary) over w1 from emp; throws NPE rather than meaningful error message like "missing window".

And also give the right window name rather than the classname in the error message after NPE issue is fixed.

org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.SemanticException: Window Spec org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.WindowingSpec$WindowSpec@7954e1de refers to an unknown source
item.summary: Hive throws NPE rather than meaningful error message when window is missing

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Update WindowingSpec class to initialize the member variables and remove unnecessary functions. Provided toString() implementation to give correct window name in the error message.

Overall: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12738408/HIVE-10963.patch
